summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality of the COO (coordinate list) sparse matrix implementation in the GPU‑accelerated CuPy SciPy compatibility layer. It exercises matrix construction, attribute access, shape handling, copying, serialization, string representation, arithmetic operations, dot products, format conversions, transpositions, summation (including duplicate handling), and universal function application, comparing results against SciPy's reference behavior.
business_intent: Guarantee that the CuPy sparse matrix API behaves correctly and matches SciPy's reference implementation across a wide range of scenarios, thereby providing reliable GPU‑accelerated sparse linear algebra for scientific and engineering applications.
